title: Might and Magic - The Complete 3DO Collection *Fixed*
description:
The entire original Might and Magic Collection. This series, along with Richard GarriottÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Ultima, was among the most important and influential RPG series of all time, and spawned a number of spin-off series, most noticeably the greatest turn-based strategy series of all time: Heroes of Might and Magic.

This torrent contains the entire ORIGINAL Might and Magic Series, created before 3DO went under. See how it all began!

Games 1-5 are included in The Ultimate Might And Magic Archives. This includes the "World of Xeen" game, which is automatically created when you install Clouds of Xeen and Dark Side of Xeen.

Ganes 4-7 are included in Might and Magic Millennium edition.

Games 8 and 9 are included individually.

For the completists out there, I have even included scans of the original inserts (except for Millennium edition, which just came in a box with white sleeves).

Note: some of these games date back to the 80's and were written for DOS. Getting them to play on a modern machine can be a royal pain in the ass. The best way to have the true experience is to get on eBay and toss together some old parts to make a DOS box. An easier and cheaper option OS to create a virtual machine using VMWare or Virtual PC. 

Apparently, a lot of people had problems with the later games in my first torrent. This was because I encoded them in .ISO format, not realizing that they were hybrid game/audio discs, which the .ISO format does not support. This torrent contains all the discs in .bin/.cue format, which should work in most programs, including Daemon tools, Roxio, Nero, ISO Buster, Magic ISO and Power ISO.

My upload speed sucks, so do the community a favor: Download ALL of this torrent (even if you only want one of the games), and then seed, seed, seed! 

And remember the law of ethical P2P: Pay for what you can find and afford. Download what you cannot. Share it all.
